duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide primary and urgent care services to nursing center residents.
Collaborate with skilled nursing center leadership to meet specific clinical goals and priorities.
Work with Medical Directors and/or Attending Physicians for patient-specific medical care.
Handle hospitalist acuity in a sub-acute environment and complete the plan of care initiated in the hospital.
Address complex medical comorbidities as part of the care team.
Play an integral role in changing effective healthcare delivery and restorative patient care.

education_certification.credential: Graduate from an accredited School of Nursing program
